model_architecture.datasets: Train, test, and val located in a gcp bucket. Video captures are manually sampled and selected to train the model
model_architecture.output: Bounding-box location of an object of interest
optics: R Thorlabs Achromatic Doublets Lens AC254-060-A

usage.protocol: RPR.P2.001V9 - Detailed robotic protocol for COC preparation, denudation and maturity assessment
usage.intended_usage: This model generates weights from training a neural network that is able to detect objects in real time
usage.out_of_scope_usage: This model is used to locate COCs or oocytes during the denudation procedure that is part of an internal IVF process
usage.misuse_or_malicious_use: This model must not be used outside conceivable prototypes

considerations.ethical_considerations: This model should not be used to detect COCs or oocytes outside the denudation procedure because it was trained to detect in an specific routine.
